title: 07/26/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, SEC, Deshaun
itunes:title: 07/26/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, SEC, Deshaun
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--critiques the timeline unfolding in Green Bay with regards to Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers and his mysterious status with the team. Doug argues that Rodgers' noncommittal behavior doesn't jive with the positive aura that surrounds Green Bay and its recent success with Rodgers. Plus, FOX College Football and The Athletic's Bruce Feldman joins The Herd to discuss the details of Texas and Oklahoma's departure from the Big XII Conference. Finally, what do the Houston Texans do with quarterback Deshaun Watson--who continues to tread water with pending civil lawsuits?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
